companies.name: Cosmic Circuits
companies.oneLiner: Provider of cutting-edge analog and mixed-signal IP solutions for semiconductor industry.
companies.detail: Develops analog and mixed-signal IP cores for connectivity and advanced technologies in 40nm and 28nm nodes, with ongoing development in 20nm and FinFET.

companies.name: Cirel Systems
companies.oneLiner: Innovator in power management solutions for smart devices and custom sensor ASICs.
companies.detail: Specializes in power management ICs for portable devices, offering integrated solutions for power application processors, regulators, and battery management.

companies.name: NanoSemi
companies.oneLiner: Developer of high-performance digital compensator IP for wireless and optical communications.
companies.detail: Creates digital compensator IP to linearize non-linear dynamic systems in wireless radios, data converters, and optical transceivers, focusing on spectral efficiency and low power consumption.

companies.name: Haystack Analytics
companies.oneLiner: Pioneer in genomics-based diagnostic solutions for infectious diseases.
companies.detail: HealthTech company developing clinical genomics products for diagnostic labs and hospitals, with a focus on infectious diseases like Tuberculosis. Recognized for innovation by Indian science agencies.

companies.name: Ethereal Machines
companies.oneLiner: Advancing 5-Axis CNC machining technology for diverse manufacturing applications.
companies.detail: Deep-Tech startup innovating in 5-Axis CNC machining technology, addressing manufacturing gaps across various industries including plastics, aerospace, and healthcare.

companies.name: BluArmor
companies.oneLiner: Innovator in comfort and safety solutions for two-wheeler riders.
companies.detail: Develops proprietary technologies like RIDEGRID™ and RIDEAURA™ to enhance two-wheeler riding experience, focusing on connectivity, communication, and safety.

companies.name: GalaxEye
companies.oneLiner: Pioneering space-tech startup developing advanced satellite imaging solutions.
companies.detail: IIT Madras incubated startup creating innovative sensing solutions for satellite imaging, founded by former members of the Avishkar Hyperloop team.

companies.name: Tonbo Imaging
companies.oneLiner: Provider of advanced sensing and imaging solutions for defense and security applications.
companies.detail: Designs and develops sensing solutions for enhanced situational awareness in security, defense, reconnaissance, and smart city applications.

companies.name: Aurasemi
companies.oneLiner: Multinational fabless semiconductor company specializing in mixed-signal IC solutions.
companies.detail: Develops high-performance integrated circuits for timing, power management, RF signal chain, and sensor applications across various markets including communications and automotive.

companies.name: Kyulux
companies.oneLiner: Developer of next-generation OLED materials using TADF/Hyperfluorescence™ technology.
companies.detail: Creates cost-effective, durable, and efficient OLED emitters without rare metals, utilizing AI-driven material development processes.

companies.name: ideaForge
companies.oneLiner: Leading manufacturer of indigenous unmanned aircraft systems in India.
companies.detail: Pioneering UAV company with the largest operational deployment of indigenous drones in India, ranked 5th globally in dual-use category drone manufacturers.

companies.name: Walden International
companies.oneLiner: Venture capital firm focusing on Sprout Stage™ investments in digital media and cloud services.
companies.detail: Targets investments in early-stage companies with mass-market potential, providing active support in brand building and scaling operations.

companies.name: Cadence
companies.oneLiner: Leader in electronic systems design software and hardware solutions.
companies.detail: Provides computational software expertise for electronic design automation, serving innovative companies across various market applications.

companies.name: Artera
companies.oneLiner: Provider of sustainable mission-critical infrastructure solutions for utility industries.
companies.detail: Offers services for natural gas, water, electric, and telecommunications industries across 41 states, building on decades of experience in critical infrastructure.

companies.name: SambaNova Systems
companies.oneLiner: Innovator in AI hardware and software solutions for enterprise applications.
companies.detail: Develops advanced AI systems to help organizations implement and scale AI technologies across various industries.

companies.name: Greenstone Biosciences
companies.oneLiner: Biotech innovator combining AI and hiPSC for accelerated drug discovery.
companies.detail: Utilizes an AI-hiPSC platform to expedite the development of effective therapies, bridging the gap between laboratory research and patient care.

companies.name: Data Patterns
companies.oneLiner: Vertically integrated provider of indigenous defense and aerospace electronics solutions.
companies.detail: Specializes in developing and manufacturing high-reliability electronic systems and mission-critical precision components for defense and space sectors.

companies.name: MTAR Technologies
companies.oneLiner: Leading manufacturer of precision engineered products for critical sectors.
companies.detail: Produces mission-critical precision components and assemblies for nuclear, space, and defense sectors, with expertise in specialized fabrication and import substitution.
